thread.title: New Research Shows How Abortion Restrictions Hurt Poor Women Most

author: Meaghan Winter
title: New Research Shows How Abortion Restrictions Hurt Poor Women Most
text: It’s pretty easy to go full Handmaid’s Tale when imagining what’s in store for reproductive rights in Trump’s America. There’s Supreme Court–nominee Neil Gorsuch , who wrote the Tenth Circuit decision that privileged Hobby Lobby’s shareholder’s religious beliefs over employees’ right to contraception. And Tom Price , the... More »
